\clearpage

# Grants: Funded



```{r grant}
ezpickr::pick("data/grant.xlsx") %>%
  tidyr::fill(-why) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(order)) %>% 
  vitae::detailed_entries(what, when, with, where, why, .protect = FALSE)
```



# Grants: Submitted or Revising


```{r grant_revise}
ezpickr::pick("data/grant_prep.xlsx") %>%
  tidyr::fill(-why) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(order)) %>% 
  vitae::detailed_entries(what, when, with, where, why, .protect = FALSE)
```
